p: The attractiveness of BCP, a natural sesquiterpene present in the essential oil of different plant species, arises from its pharmacological feature as a CB2 receptor agonist. This characteristic, along with the lack of interaction with the CB1, makes BCP an interesting plant endocannabinoid with the advantage of lacking any psychotropic effect, as is typical of some Cannabis extracts [ 8, 311, 312].
